EmailTemplate.name: 201806_WebinarInviteG650_LG.201806_WebinarInviteG650_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Flight Management System Test Tool for the G650
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Tech Tips Webinar: Flight Management System Test Tool for the G650 Please join us... Date July 10, 2018
Time 12pm-1pm EST (UTC -5)
Location Free Webinar - Register <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Nxg-TPFoRkW-FSdZyXAaZg>
Honeywell’s Flight Management System (FMS) Built-in Test Equipment (BITE) tool helps G650 operators quickly download and clear FMS BITE files. This tool downloads files to help investigate issues, determine root causes, and then clears them to restore FMS operation if necessary.
Please join Honeywell expert John Dano for a free technical webinar highlighting how to use the BITE clear utility for the G650 FMS. He will also review the relevant Service Information Letters and clarify how to use that function. Register here <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Nxg-TPFoRkW-FSdZyXAaZg>.
Questions will be answered.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Nxg-TPFoRkW-FSdZyXAaZg]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
